title: Light On the Sound
description: HE WAS SWORN TO UPHOLD AND DEFEND THE INQUEST. NOW HE STOOD READY TO DESTROY IT. For countless millennia the godlike Inquestors ruled a million worlds w/unimaginable power, waging an unending war on false utopias. Ton Davaryush had destroyed a dozen worlds int he service of that dark crusade. But on the 13th world, he glimpsed a dazzling truth that would sow the seeds of the Inquest's destruction.
author: S.P. Somtow
